features: [Convenient Setup] Plug and play recording USB microphone for PC. With USB 2.0 for data transfer, no additional drivers required. Great for recording music, computer singing, meetings, streaming, chat podcasts, YouTube, etc. Easy to use and install.
[Lossless Audio] With the 24bit/48KHz sampling rate and dual-core Digital Signal Processing(DSP), the 1Mii M3 condenser microphone brings you high-quality audio experience.
[Quick Mute] Tap-to-mute. The soft-touch mute button helps you instantly mute the gaming microphone without audible noises when streaming or podcasting.
[Compact Design] Three colors to choose. The Adjustable tripod stand makes the 1Mii M3 condenser microphone more flexible at every angle.
[Realtime Monitoring] With the 3.5mm audio output, the 1Mii M3 microphone for PC can monitor the quality of recording and the volume level.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 1Mii M3 USB Condenser Microphone for PC Easy plug-and-play device. The 1Mii M3 USB Micrphone doesn’t need any special drivers to work with your computer. Just connect the 1Mii M3 condenser microphone to your computer, launch your favorite audio software, and start recording.

1Mii USB Mircophone for Recording/Chat Stream/Podcasts The 1Mii M3 USB condensor microphone offers high-quality recordings and can be plugged directly into your computer. While recording or podcasting, it can cutting out background noise from recorded audio. Also it delivers crystal clear voice while chatting.

Previous page Chat with Friends The hidden shock-absorbing bracket can be fixed on the desktop, making chatting easier. Streaming Podcasting With a cardioid pickup pattern, this USB mic is perfect for picking up vocals. Easy Recording, No Driver Needed 1Mii M3 USB recording mic for videos works with any recording software or communication platform. Enjoy the Game to the Fullest The 1Mii M3 gaming computer microphone is compatible with Windows, Mac IOS and Linux. Next page 1 Chatting 2 Podcasting 3 Recording 4 Gaming
Adjustable Tripod Stand The adjustable stand makes the 1Mii M3 USB condenser microphone more flexible at every angle, it helps to record the voice more clearly.
Tap-to-mute. The soft-touch mute button on the 1Mii USB microphone helps you instantly mute the microphone without audible noises when streaming or podcasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing Short Of Exceptional
reviews.reviewText: This USB microphone has become an integral part of my recording setup. Its seamless compatibility with my phone, user-friendly design, and impressive audio performance make it a valuable tool for content creators, musicians, and podcasters alike. If you're in search of a reliable and straightforward USB microphone that delivers quality results without unnecessary complications, this microphone is a great investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: Sounds good outside of headphones but a bit weird in them. A bit hard to get settings just right but it gets job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m using this to record my mom telling stories of growing up in the Philippines
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to plug in and use. I did have to go into the program I use (Audacity) to turn the mic volume playback up. It works fine for what I’m using it for. My goal isn’t to put the audio on a podcast or online, it’s really just for our family and to record her memories growing up. It’s making me motivated to eventually write a book with her

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great USB mic
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how to compare this to a professional condenser mic, I'm sure there's a noticable difference in quality to someone that knows their stuff. But for a USB mic that plugs straight into my PC without having to use an XLR adapter, this works perfectly for me. I use it for occasional voice over, or for my mic when I'm on discord. It has clear pickup quality, and doesn't catch too much of the excess room noise (my room isn't sound proofed at all). I swapped the USB that came with the mic for a longer one, but that was the only necessary modification for my purposes. I'm not in love with the mount, but it does support the mix without tipping or being unbalanced. All and all Im really happy with this mic, it works good, looks good, makes me feel slightly more professional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the loudest microphone on the planet
reviews.reviewText: So I wanted to start doing some review videos, and I'm trying to put together a budget audio system to do voiceovers and the like. I came across the microphone, the price was right and so I went ahead and ordered it.The Mic works, but the audio requires normalization and some amplification to get it to a level that is usable. Because it is USB, I can't run it through a mixing board or external amplifier. I am limited with the amount of gain I have natively, so to be honest, I'm not real impressed with it.While this is not a great microphone, IMHO, it appears upon further research that you can make it sound good with post processing, and using some filters in third party applications. I think for the money i would rather go with an XLR mic vs USB, and add an inexpensive mixing board to get the input sound I want before it is imported into the workstation. Mediocre in equals mediocre out.BTW, you will most likely have delays when trying to use two USB microphones, for example in an interview situation (so I've read). I'd highliy recommend doing some research on USB vs. XLR if you're new to this like me.I would not buy this again knowing what I know now, as it does not fit my use case. Do your research.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great beginner streaming mic. Has all the good qualities and sound I was needed since I am starting out. Might need additional software to make it pitch perfect but as it is, it's great for what I need it to be.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Better but not ideal
reviews.reviewText: This Microphone was better than one I previously ordered but was still around the same quality. Save your money and spring for a microphone upwards of fifty bucks. There is no way the quality of something under that amount will suffice. I have tried and kept being disappointed. Don’t waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great budget mic for getting started.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my kid for her videos and D&D sessions. There have been no complaints. It works well enough and for the pricetag it does its job well enough. It is built with not the most sturdy stand and materials but it's a budget starter mic. If you plan on collecting high fidelity recordings you should look elsewhere.
